directions: Blend banana, almond milk, 3 blackberries, 4 strawberries, ice cubes, coconut yogurt, and acai powder in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl. Top mixture with mango, granola, coconut, 3 blackberries, 4 strawberries, blueberries, almond butter, and honey.
ingredients: 1/2 mango, peeled and chopped, or more to taste
2 tablespoons shredded coconut, or more to taste
2 tablespoons blueberries, or more to taste
1 tablespoon almond butter, or to taste
title: Fruity 3-Step Acai Bowl - Healthy "ICE-cream!"
